page.title: 17HOPE VALLEY LIONS
page.content: The Hope Valley Lions Club was formed almost 16 years ago by men who uphold the principles of Lions International. There are over 330,000 Lions clubs in 56 countries. They have one and a quarter million members whose aim is raise money to help people who are less fortunate than themselves. This year Hope Valley president is Harry Newton, and he has been with the club through out its life. The club in its time has raised and spent over Â£50,000. The list of receiving organisations is endless. Many local charities have benefited from the hard work the Lions of Hope Valley have put in over the years. None of the funds raised goes in administration costs so that every pound donated by the public goes to charitable causes.
